titles.title: Military Aviators Cancer Incidence Study Act
Military Aviators Cancer Incidence Study Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to develop a comprehensive database and repository on military aviators and conduct a study on such aviators to determine the incidence of cancer diagnosis and mortality among such aviators, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Aviators Cancer Incidence Study Act
This bill directs the Department of Defense to develop a comprehensive database and repository on military aviators documenting the cancers, date of diagnosis, and mortality of such aviators and to conduct a study on cancer among military aviators in two phases.
